org.openimaj.content.animation.animator

Interface ReversableValueAnimator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    ValueAnimator<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardBackwardLoopingValueAnimator, LinearByteValueAnimator, LinearDoubleValueAnimator, LinearFloatValueAnimator, LinearIntegerValueAnimator, LinearLongValueAnimator, LinearShortValueAnimator

    public interface ReversableValueAnimator<T>
extends ValueAnimator<T>
    Interfaces for ValueAnimators that can be reversed.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReversableValueAnimator<T> reverseAnimator()
      Reverse the animator and return it, or make a new animator with the same state as this animator, but reversed direction.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openimaj.content.animation.animator.ValueAnimator

        hasFinished, nextValue, reset

      • reverseAnimator

        ReversableValueAnimator<T> reverseAnimator()
        Reverse the animator and return it, or make a new animator with the same state as this animator, but reversed direction.
        Returns:
        reversed animator.
